Report.SQLvalue: SELECT DISTINCT ORD.ORDER_ID AS "ORDER ID", ADD.MEMBER_ID AS "CUSTOMER ID", COALESCE(ADD.FIRST_NAME,'') CONCAT ( CASE WHEN ADD.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND ADD.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END CONCAT COALESCE(ADD.LAST_NAME,'')) AS "CUNSTOMER NAME", ORD.CREATED_TIME AS "ORDER PLACED", ORD.LAST_UPDATE AS "LAST UPDATE", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ORDER STATUS", (ORD.TOTAL_VALUE) AS "AMOUNT", ORD.ORDER_CURRENCY AS "CURRENCY", PRD.NAME AS "ITEM", ITEM.NUM_UNITS AS "QUANTITY", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ITEM STATUS", ITEM.UNIT_PRICE AS "ITEM PRICE", INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_LDESC AS "INVENTORY" FROM WCA.ADDRESS ADD, WCA.FACT_ORDERS ORD, WCA.FACT_ORDERITEMS ITEM, WCA.ORDER_STATUS_REF ORDREF, WCA.INVNTRY_STAT_REF INVREF, WCA.PRODUCT_REF PRD WHERE ADD.MEMBER_ID = ORD.MEMBER_ID AND ORD.ORDER_ID = ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID = ORD.ORDER_STATUS_ID AND ITEM.INVNTRY_STAT_ID = INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_ID AND PRD.PRODUCT_ID=ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORD.ORDER_ID={order_id} AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID={order_status} AND PRD.LANGUAGE_ID=({LanguageID}) AND ORD.STORE_ID=({storeent_id}) AND ORD.CREATED_TIME >= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({StartDate})$ AND ORD.CREATED_TIME <= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({EndDate})$ ORDER BY "CUSTOMER ID" DESC

userDefinedParameters.TDStyle: TD { font-family : Arial, Helvetica, Sans-serif; font-size : 9pt; line-height: 9pt; color : Black; }

Report.SQLvalue: SELECT DISTINCT ORD.ORDER_ID AS "ORDER ID", ADD.MEMBER_ID AS "CUSTOMER ID", COALESCE(ADD.FIRST_NAME,'') CONCAT ( CASE WHEN ADD.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND ADD.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END CONCAT COALESCE(ADD.LAST_NAME,'')) AS "CUNSTOMER NAME", ORD.CREATED_TIME AS "ORDER PLACED", ORD.LAST_UPDATE AS "LAST UPDATE", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ORDER STATUS", (ORD.TOTAL_VALUE) AS "AMOUNT", ORD.ORDER_CURRENCY AS "CURRENCY", PRD.NAME AS "ITEM", ITEM.NUM_UNITS AS "QUANTITY", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ITEM STATUS", ITEM.UNIT_PRICE AS "ITEM PRICE", INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_LDESC AS "INVENTORY" FROM WCA.ADDRESS ADD, WCA.FACT_ORDERS ORD, WCA.FACT_ORDERITEMS ITEM, WCA.ORDER_STATUS_REF ORDREF, WCA.INVNTRY_STAT_REF INVREF, WCA.PRODUCT_REF PRD WHERE ADD.MEMBER_ID = ORD.MEMBER_ID AND ORD.ORDER_ID = ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID = ORD.ORDER_STATUS_ID AND ITEM.INVNTRY_STAT_ID = INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_ID AND PRD.PRODUCT_ID=ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORD.ORDER_ID={order_id} AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID={order_status} AND PRD.LANGUAGE_ID=({LanguageID}) AND ORD.STORE_ID=({storeent_id}) AND YEAR(ORD.CREATED_TIME) = YEAR(CURRENT DATE) AND WEEK(ORD.CREATED_TIME) = WEEK(CURRENT DATE) ORDER BY "ORDER PLACED" DESC

userDefinedParameters.THStyle: TH { font-family : Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size : 10pt; color : #565665; font-weight : bold; }
userDefinedParameters.TDStyle: TD { font-family : Arial, Helvetica, Sans-serif; font-size : 9pt; line-height: 9pt; color : Black; }

Report.SQLvalue: SELECT DISTINCT ORD.ORDER_ID AS "ORDER ID", ADD.MEMBER_ID AS "CUSTOMER ID", COALESCE(ADD.FIRST_NAME,'') CONCAT ( CASE WHEN ADD.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND ADD.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END CONCAT COALESCE(ADD.LAST_NAME,'')) AS "CUNSTOMER NAME", ORD.CREATED_TIME AS "ORDER PLACED", ORD.LAST_UPDATE AS "LAST UPDATE", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ORDER STATUS", (ORD.TOTAL_VALUE) AS "AMOUNT", ORD.ORDER_CURRENCY AS "CURRENCY", PRD.NAME AS "ITEM", ITEM.NUM_UNITS AS "QUANTITY", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ITEM STATUS", ITEM.UNIT_PRICE AS "ITEM PRICE", INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_LDESC AS "INVENTORY" FROM WCA.ADDRESS ADD, WCA.FACT_ORDERS ORD, WCA.FACT_ORDERITEMS ITEM, WCA.ORDER_STATUS_REF ORDREF, WCA.INVNTRY_STAT_REF INVREF, WCA.PRODUCT_REF PRD WHERE ADD.MEMBER_ID = ORD.MEMBER_ID AND ORD.ORDER_ID = ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID = ORD.ORDER_STATUS_ID AND ITEM.INVNTRY_STAT_ID = INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_ID AND PRD.PRODUCT_ID=ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORD.ORDER_ID={order_id} AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID={order_status} AND PRD.LANGUAGE_ID=({LanguageID}) AND ORD.STORE_ID=({storeent_id}) AND YEAR(ORD.CREATED_TIME) = YEAR(CURRENT DATE) AND MONTH(ORD.CREATED_TIME) = MONTH(CURRENT DATE) ORDER BY "ORDER PLACED" DESC

Report.SQLvalue: SELECT DISTINCT ADD.MEMBER_ID AS "CUSTOMER ID", COALESCE(ADD.FIRST_NAME,'') CONCAT ( CASE WHEN ADD.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND ADD.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END CONCAT COALESCE(ADD.LAST_NAME,'')) AS "CUNSTOMER NAME", ORD.ORDER_ID AS "ORDER ID", ORD.CREATED_TIME AS "ORDER PLACED", ORD.LAST_UPDATE AS "LAST UPDATE", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ORDER STATUS", (ORD.TOTAL_VALUE) AS "AMOUNT", ORD.ORDER_CURRENCY AS "CURRENCY", PRD.NAME AS "ITEM", ITEM.NUM_UNITS AS "QUANTITY", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ITEM STATUS", ITEM.UNIT_PRICE AS "ITEM PRICE", INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_LDESC AS "INVENTORY" FROM WCA.ADDRESS ADD, WCA.FACT_ORDERS ORD, WCA.FACT_ORDERITEMS ITEM, WCA.ORDER_STATUS_REF ORDREF, WCA.INVNTRY_STAT_REF INVREF, WCA.PRODUCT_REF PRD WHERE ADD.MEMBER_ID = ORD.MEMBER_ID AND ORD.ORDER_ID = ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID = ORD.ORDER_STATUS_ID AND ITEM.INVNTRY_STAT_ID = INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_ID AND PRD.PRODUCT_ID=ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID={order_status} AND ORD.ORDER_ID={order_id} AND PRD.LANGUAGE_ID=({LanguageID}) AND ORD.STORE_ID=({storeent_id}) AND YEAR(ORD.CREATED_TIME)=YEAR(CURRENT DATE) ORDER BY "ORDER PLACED" DESC

Report.SQLvalue: SELECT DISTINCT ORD.ORDER_ID AS "ORDER ID", ADD.MEMBER_ID AS "CUSTOMER ID", COALESCE(ADD.FIRST_NAME,'') CONCAT ( CASE WHEN ADD.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND ADD.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END CONCAT COALESCE(ADD.LAST_NAME,'')) AS "CUNSTOMER NAME", ORD.CREATED_TIME AS "ORDER PLACED", ORD.LAST_UPDATE AS "LAST UPDATE", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ORDER STATUS", (ORD.TOTAL_VALUE) AS "AMOUNT", ORD.ORDER_CURRENCY AS "CURRENCY", PRD.NAME AS "ITEM", ITEM.NUM_UNITS AS "QUANTITY", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ITEM STATUS", ITEM.UNIT_PRICE AS "ITEM PRICE", INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_LDESC AS "INVENTORY" FROM WCA.ADDRESS ADD, WCA.FACT_ORDERS ORD, WCA.FACT_ORDERITEMS ITEM, WCA.ORDER_STATUS_REF ORDREF, WCA.INVNTRY_STAT_REF INVREF, WCA.PRODUCT_REF PRD WHERE ADD.MEMBER_ID = ORD.MEMBER_ID AND ORD.ORDER_ID = ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID = ORD.ORDER_STATUS_ID AND ITEM.INVNTRY_STAT_ID = INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_ID AND PRD.PRODUCT_ID=ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORD.ORDER_ID={order_id} AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID={order_status} AND PRD.LANGUAGE_ID=({LanguageID}) AND ORD.STORE_ID=({storeent_id}) AND ORD.CREATED_TIME >= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({StartDate})$ AND ORD.CREATED_TIME <= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({EndDate})$ ORDER BY "ORDER PLACED" ASC

Report.SQLvalue: SELECT DISTINCT ORD.ORDER_ID AS "ORDER ID", ADD.MEMBER_ID AS "CUSTOMER ID", COALESCE(ADD.FIRST_NAME,'') CONCAT ( CASE WHEN ADD.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND ADD.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE '' END CONCAT COALESCE(ADD.LAST_NAME,'')) AS "CUNSTOMER NAME", ORD.CREATED_TIME AS "ORDER PLACED", ORD.LAST_UPDATE AS "LAST UPDATE", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ORDER STATUS", (ORD.TOTAL_VALUE) AS "AMOUNT", ORD.ORDER_CURRENCY AS "CURRENCY", PRD.NAME AS "ITEM", ITEM.NUM_UNITS AS "QUANTITY", ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_DESC AS "ITEM STATUS", ITEM.UNIT_PRICE AS "ITEM PRICE", INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_LDESC AS "INVENTORY" FROM WCA.ADDRESS ADD, WCA.FACT_ORDERS ORD, WCA.FACT_ORDERITEMS ITEM, WCA.ORDER_STATUS_REF ORDREF, WCA.INVNTRY_STAT_REF INVREF, WCA.PRODUCT_REF PRD WHERE ADD.MEMBER_ID = ORD.MEMBER_ID AND ORD.ORDER_ID = ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID = ORD.ORDER_STATUS_ID AND ITEM.INVNTRY_STAT_ID = INVREF.INVNTRY_STAT_ID AND PRD.PRODUCT_ID=ITEM.ORDER_ID AND ORD.ORDER_ID={order_id} AND ORDREF.ORDER_STATUS_ID={order_status} AND PRD.LANGUAGE_ID=({LanguageID}) AND ORD.STORE_ID=({storeent_id}) AND DATE(ORD.CREATED_TIME) = (CURRENT DATE - 1 DAYS) ORDER BY "ORDER PLACED" ASC
